scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket app-repo-components
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name api-lambda-stripe-charge --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides SSMParameterPath=lambda-stripe-charge/stripe-secret-key EnableInstantCapture=false
scripts.describe: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name api-lambda-stripe-charge --query Stacks[].Outputs[].OutputValue --output text
scripts.qd: npm run prepack && npm run package && npm run deploy && npm run describe
